ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and(not(ISCHANGED( GGP_Number__c )),$Profile.Id != '00e30000001YLF7',(or( RecordType.Name='VOC' , RecordType.Name='VOC Read Only' )),(or(Development_Customer_Expectations__c = '' , Development_Summary__c = '' )),(or(text(Development_Customer_Rating__c) ='Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied' , text(Development_Customer_Rating__c) = 'Red - Very Dissatisfied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check that Development Customer Expectations and Development Summary fields are filled.
